title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 374 - Management Of Specific Hazardous Waste
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 374 - Management Of Specific Hazardous Waste

State Regulations

Subpart 374-1 - Standards for the Management of Specific Hazardous Wastes and Specific Types of Hazardous Waste Management Facilities (§ 374-1.1 to 374-1.13)

Subpart 374-2 - Standards for the Management of Used Oil (§ 374-2.1 to 374-2.10)

Subpart 374-3 - Standards for Universal Wastes (§ 374-3.1 to 374-3.7)

Subpart 374-4 - Standards for the Management of Elemental Mercury and Dental Amalgam Wastes at Dental Facilities (§ 374-4.1 to 374-4.2)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 374

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, art. 3, title 3, §§ 19-0301, 19-0303, 19-0304, 19-0306, 23-2305, 23-2307, 23-2308, art. 27, §§ 27,0105, 27-0106, 27-0305, 27-0926, titles 1, 3, 7, 9, 27-2007, §§ 70-0107, 70-0109, 70-0115, art. 71, § 71-2201, titles 27, 35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
